item.description:
The Dorchester Arts Collaborative was founded in 2002 to develop and facilitate arts programming in Dorchester and to cultivate the social, cultural, and economic enrichment of Boston's largest and most diverse neighborhood.

Be a part of a series of art-inspired networking events. Discuss aesthetic, craft and talent by crawling with fellow artists and architects as part of larger open artist studio events. After visiting local studios, the party will head somewhere nearby for food or drinks. If you can't make the party, you can visit the Dorchester Open studios from October 23 - 24.

Meet outside Anna's Bakery (1035 Dorchester Ave.) at 1 pm.

For more information contact Rebecca McWilliams at rmcwilliams[at]smma.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside Anna's Bakery at 1:00 pm.
item.name: Architects and Artists Collaborate: Dorchester Open Studio Crawl
